mapper.select: SELECT * FROM matchs m LEFT OUTER JOIN courts c ON m.courtId = c.courtId WHERE DATE(m.matchDate) = DATE(#{matchDate}) AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, now(),m.matchDate ) >= 0;
SELECT * FROM matchs m LEFT OUTER JOIN courts c ON m.courtId = c.courtId WHERE m.matchId = #{matchId}
SELECT * FROM matchs m INNER JOIN courts c ON m.courtId = c.courtId WHERE m.matchId = #{matchId} AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND,now(), matchDate ) >= 0;
SELECT courtCapacity FROM courts WHERE courtId = (SELECT courtId FROM matchs WHERE matchId = #{matchId})
SELECT matchApplicantCnt FROM matchs WHERE matchId = #{matchId}
mapper.update: UPDATE matchs SET matchApplicantCnt = matchApplicantCnt+1 WHERE matchId = #{matchId}
